name: The Myth of Pumpkins and Wolves
name_original: The Myth of Pumpkins and Wolves
description:
There is a myth... in night like this, when the moon is full in the sky... there are few people around... and too wolves.

how to play: 

  • Just use arrow keys. 
  • Stay away from the wolves until you don't have the magic of pumpkins...
  • Touch all the pumpkins to fire the magic 
  • When you have the magic you can go near the wolves

I made this game for the Mini Jam 89: Pumpkin.

All the resources made in the time of the game jam.

if you like the music, you can use it...
